definition: lit. there are many swift horses, but very few who can spot them (idiom)/fig. many have talent, but few can recognize talent when they see it
pinyin: qian1 li3 ma3 chang2 you3 , er2 Bo2 Le4 bu4 chang2 you3
simplified: 千里马常有，而伯乐不常有
word: 千里馬常有，而伯樂不常有
